tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE potential_customers (
    customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_name VARCHAR(255),
    customer_email VARCHAR(255),
    customer_location VARCHAR(255),
    distance_from_business_km FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE PotentialCustomers (
  potential_customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_id INT,
  location_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (customer_id) REFERENCES Customers(customer_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (location_id) REFERENCES BusinessLocations(location_id)
);

CREATE TABLE customers (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(50),
    address VARCHAR(100),
    latitude DOUBLE,
    longitude DOUBLE
);

CREATE TABLE businesses (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(50),
    address VARCHAR(100),
    latitude DOUBLE,
    longitude DOUBLE
);

CREATE TABLE Customers (
    customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_name VARCHAR(50),
    customer_email VARCHAR(50),
    customer_address VARCHAR(100),
    customer_longitude DOUBLE PRECISION,
    customer_latitude DOUBLE PRECISION
)

CREATE TABLE Businesses (
    business_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    business_name VARCHAR(50),
    business_location VARCHAR(100),
    business_longitude DOUBLE PRECISION,
    business_latitude DOUBLE PRECISION
)

CREATE TABLE Radius (
    radius_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    radius_value DOUBLE PRECISION
)

CREATE TABLE PotentialCustomers (
    customer_id INT,
    business_id INT,
    distance DOUBLE PRECISION,
    FOREIGN KEY (customer_id) REFERENCES Customers(customer_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (business_id) REFERENCES Businesses(business_id)
)

CREATE TABLE MarketingCampaigns (
    campaign_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    campaign_name VARCHAR(50),
    campaign_description VARCHAR(200),
    campaign_budget DECIMAL(10,2)
)
